mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MENTOR( MENTOR_WANT_TO_SAY, MENTOR_DISCORD_ID, MENTOR_MEMBER_ID, MENTOR_CONTENT_ID) VALUES( #{mentor_want_to_say}, #{mentor_discord_id}, #{mentor_member_id}, #{mentor_content_id} )
INSERT INTO MENTEE( MENTEE_WANT_TO_SAY, MENTEE_MEMBER_ID, MENTEE_CONTENT_ID) VALUES( #{mentee_want_to_say}, #{mentee_member_id}, #{mentee_content_id} )
